definition: husk/(of a radish etc) spongy (and therefore unappetising)

sentences.english: This paper introduces 12 cases of pityriasis rosea complicated by urticaria.
sentences.chinese: 報道了12例玫瑰糠疹合併蕁麻疹病例。

sentences.english: Pityriasis rosea is an acute, benign, self-limiting skin rash.
sentences.chinese: 玫瑰糠疹是一種急性的良性自限性皮疹。

sentences.english: Who can tell me to get rose branny rash what to drug take good the fastest?
sentences.chinese: 誰能告訴我得了玫瑰糠疹喫什麼藥好的最快？

sentences.english: Those who how got rose branny rash to cure is fast?
sentences.chinese: 得了玫瑰糠疹怎麼治好的快啊？

sentences.english: It is learned that pityriasis rosea is a common skin inflammation.
sentences.chinese: 據悉，玫瑰糠疹只是一種常見的皮膚炎症。

definition: pityriasis versicolor (aka tinea versicolor), blotchy skin condition common in tropical areas, common name 汗斑
tinea cruris, fungal skin infection of the groin/dermatomycosis, esp. sexually transmitted/jock itch
common name for 花斑癣, tinea versicolor
